!Magister Winonin: Oh, marvelous! If we all develop our strengths and work together, we will triumph over the coming cataclysm. My colleagues and I have recently developed a method of enhancing weaponry that should prove quite useful to all of us. This *weapons enhancement* boosts strength noticeably in combat.
